name: react-appointment-system-backend
description: Backend server for the React Appointment System

scripts.start: node -e "if (process.env.FORCE_DB_RESET === 'true') { try { require('child_process').execSync('node db-reset-init.js', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('DB Reset via db-reset-init.js successful. Set FORCE_DB_RESET to false or remove it for normal startup.'); process.exit(0); } catch (e) { console.error('Error during db-reset-init.js:', e); process.exit(1); } } else { try { require('child_process').execSync('node emergency-test-data.js && node update_schema.js && node server.js', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e) { console.error('Error during normal startup (emergency-test-data.js && update_schema.js && server.js):', e); process.exit(1); } }"
